code: export var logout=function logout(){localStorage.removeItem("userData");};export var isLogin=function isLogin(){if(localStorage.getItem("userData")){var data=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("userData"));if(data.token){return true;}else{return false;}}else{return false;}};export var isLoginAdmin=function isLoginAdmin(){if(localStorage.getItem("userData")){var data=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("userData"));if(data.token){return true;}else{return false;}}else{return false;}};
